act.desc: Performance of bulk operation above the selected assets

act.desc: Calculate the balance of assets by the entered date

msg.name: danOdpisPrepocitatDanOdpisyChyba
msg.titl: Tax write-off exceeds tax depreciation basis.

msg.titl: Accounting depreciation exceeds tax depreciation basis.

msg.name: danOdpisNepodariloAktualizovat
msg.titl: Tax depreciation update failed.

msg.name: danOdpisUcetNeniVyplnen
msg.titl: Account must be filled in case, that no accounting depreciation is generated.

msg.name: leasingWizNenalezenaSazbaDph
msg.titl: Rate value wasn't found for given VAT rate type. Instalments will not be calculated correctly.

msg.name: leasingWizSazbyNenacteny
msg.titl: Reading of valid VAT rates settings failed. Generation of lease payments won't work correctly.

msg.name: leasingNepodariloVygenerovat
msg.titl: Generate leasing payments schedule failed.

msg.name: leasingNelzeGenerovatPredUcetnimObdobi
msg.titl: It is not possible to generate schedule of payments and tax expenses of leasing before current accounting period.

msg.name: leasingNelzeGenerovatNeplatnyZavazek
msg.titl: Error has occurred during validation of obligation to leasing '%p' and to schedule of payments with date '%p' and code '%p' :

msg.name: leasingWizChybaNevyplnenaPole
msg.titl: You must fill in all fields in form.

msg.name: leasingWizardBezSplNeboVypl
msg.titl: On the form you must fill in all data or zero number of payments.

msg.name: leasingWizardSplatkySePrekryvaji
msg.titl: Lease instalment not overlap. Check the entered dates.

msg.name: leasingWizChybiRadaDokladu
msg.titl: Filled type of document doesn't have document row number entered and none is specified.

msg.name: leasingWizChybiRocniPolozkaRady
msg.titl: Selected document type does not specify a numerical range of annual appropriations for the next financial year.

msg.name: leasingWizChybaKontrolyRady
msg.titl: Error occurred during row number verification.

msg.name: leasingNemaVstupniCenaSplatKalSPoradim
msg.titl: No schedule of payments exists to the leasing for '%p' to instalment with order '%p'.

msg.name: leasingNelzeGenerovatZavazekUhrazen
msg.titl: It is not possible to generate the leasing because obligation has already been settled.

msg.name: leasingNelzeSmazatZavazekUhrazen
msg.titl: Leasing cannot be removed because obligation has already been settled.

msg.name: leasingChybaPriMazaniZavazku
msg.titl: Leasing obligation cannot by removed.

msg.name: majetekSpadaDoJinehoObdobi
msg.titl: It is not possible to record property that is entered into a different accounting period.

msg.name: majetekOdpisyNevygenerovany
msg.titl: Generation of depreciation schedule failed.

msg.name: majetekNehmotnyChybnyZpusOdpK
msg.titl: For the selected type of assets the wrong method of depreciation is selected.

msg.name: majetekNelzeGenerovatMimoObdobi
msg.titl: It is not possible to generate depreciation schedule outside the accounting period in which the property was capitalized.

msg.name: majetekNelzeGenerovatUdalost
msg.titl: It is not possible to generate event with date %p and amount %p. Property price would be negative or zero.

msg.name: majetekNeodepisovanySOdpisy
msg.titl: Non-depreciable property cannot be depreciated. Depreciation transactions will be removed.

msg.name: majetekNeodepisovanyNelzeGenerovat
msg.titl: It is not possible to generate depreciation schedule for non-depreciable property.

msg.name: majetekOdpisyDanDatumZacatkuPredZaraz
msg.titl: Tax write-off date may not precede property capitalization date.

msg.name: majetekOdpisyUcetDatumZacatkuPredZaraz
msg.titl: Accounting depreciation start date may not precede property filing date.

msg.name: majetekNevyplnenoZrychOdepis
msg.titl: It is necessary to fill in the depreciation in the first year to enable accelerated depreciation.

msg.name: majetekNevyplnenoTypMajetku
msg.titl: It is necessary to fill in property type.

msg.name: majetekNevyplnenoSazba
msg.titl: It is necessary to fill in depreciable group.

msg.name: majetekNevyplnenoUcetniOdpisy
msg.titl: It is necessary to confirm whether you want to calculate accounting depreciation.

msg.name: majetekNevyplnenoDatumZarazeni
msg.titl: Capitalization date is not filled in.

msg.name: majetekNevyplnenoPrimarniUcet
msg.titl: Primary account is not filled in.

msg.name: majetekNevyplnenoProtiUcet
msg.titl: Offset account is not filled in.

msg.name: majetekNevyplnenoOdpisovyUcet
msg.titl: Asset depreciation account is not filled in.

msg.name: majetekNevyplnenoOpravnyUcet
msg.titl: Accumulated depreciation account is not filled in.

msg.name: majetekNevyplnenoZacDanOdpisu
msg.titl: Tax write-off date is not filled in.

msg.name: majetekNevyplnenoZacUcetOdpisu
msg.titl: Accounting depreciation start date is not filled in.

msg.name: majetekNevyplnenoZpusobOdepis
msg.titl: Depreciation method has not been selected.

msg.name: majetekDatVystNelzeDoMinulosti
msg.titl: Issue date must be in current account period or earlier.

msg.name: majetekNenalezenyOdpovidajiSazby
msg.titl: No depreciable rates were found for selected depreciation method.

msg.name: majetekPocetMesicuNeniNenulovy
msg.titl: Number of months must have non-zero value.

msg.name: majetekPocetMesicuNenulovyZustCenaNula
msg.titl: If the number of months of accounting depreciation is specified, the amortised cost must not be zero.

msg.name: majetekUcetniOdpisyVDE
msg.titl: Accounting depreciation cannot be generated in the tax record.

msg.name: majetekUcetniOdpisyVDE_SK
msg.titl: Accounting depreciation cannot be generated in simple accounting.

msg.name: majetekNenulovyDanZustOdepsaneho
msg.titl: Property has a non-zero balance, but it should have been already deducted according to the rate.

msg.name: majetekTechZhodnocenJenDriveOdepsany
msg.titl: Assets that have not been previously depreciated cannot be technically evaluated before classification.

msg.name: majetekProcentoNeniNenulove
msg.titl: Percent per year must have non-zero value.

msg.name: majetekChybnyTypOdpisu
msg.titl: Select depreciation method appropriate to selected property type.

msg.name: majetekChybiSazbaOdpisu
msg.titl: You must select depreciative rate for selected depreciation method.

msg.name: majetekChybnaSazbaOdpisu
msg.titl: Selected depreciation rate is incompatible with selected depreciation method.

msg.name: majetekNepodariloSeNajitDokladProVytvoreniMajetku
msg.titl: It was not possible to find document for generate of property card.

msg.name: majetekSazbaOdpisuNulovaDobaOdp
msg.titl: A zero depreciation rate cannot be used.

msg.name: majetekGenPoMigraciStatus
msg.titl: Generating property accounting depreciation:

msg.name: odpisyZmenaObdobiZamceno
msg.titl: Failed to change the depreciation value, because the period (%p) is locked.

msg.name: sazbaChybaZjisteniNavazanychMajetku
msg.titl: It was not possible to verify whether there are already-registered properties linked to depreciation rate.

msg.name: udalostPredDatemZarazeni
msg.titl: Event date may be older than property capitalization date.

msg.name: udalostNePoVyrazeni
msg.titl: No event may occur after event retirement of the property.

msg.name: udalostNePredZarazenim
msg.titl: No event may occur before capitalization.

msg.name: udalostNaDanOpdisyPredZacDanOdpisu
msg.titl: Event date must be later than initiation of accounting depreciation.

msg.name: udalostNaUceOpdisyPredZacUceOdpisu
msg.titl: Event date must be later than initialization of accounting depreciation.

msg.name: udalostNesmiBytPredZacOdpisu
msg.titl: Event date must be later than initiation of tax and accounting depreciation.

msg.name: udalostMusiMitDatVystVAktualnimObdobi
msg.titl: Event date must be in a period that is valid for current project.

msg.name: udalostNemaVyplnenoStredisko
msg.titl: Event must include valid cost centre.

msg.name: udalostZarazeniJizObsazena
msg.titl: Capitalization event is already included in event list.

msg.name: udalostNelzePridatVyrazeni
msg.titl: It is not possible to add new event after retiring property.

msg.name: udalostVyrazeniObsazena
msg.titl: Property has already been retired.

msg.name: udalostVyrazeniNesmazat
msg.titl: It is not possible to remove retirement event, if other events are linked to it.

msg.name: udalostVyplnitVsechnyUcty
msg.titl: All accounts must be filled in during this event.

msg.name: udalostMinHodnotaPolozky
msg.titl: Minimal item value

msg.name: udalostMinHodnotaProdlouzeni
msg.titl: The value of the %p field must be greater than zero.

msg.name: udalostSumZklTZNesmiBytZaporna
msg.titl: The %p field value must not be negative for technical evaluation.

msg.name: udalostZmenaDobyOdpis
msg.titl: Change of depreciation period

msg.name: udalostNeexistujiUcetPolozky
msg.titl: No accounting depreciation would exist to date {0}

msg.name: udalostDveNeboViceZarazeni
msg.titl: It is possible to capitalize property only once.

msg.name: udalostDveNeboViceVyrazeni
msg.titl: It is possible to retire a property only once.

msg.name: udalostPoPreruseniJenomUrciteUdal
msg.titl: It is not possible to add this event, because depreciation was aborted.

msg.name: udalostOpetZahDanBezPreruseni
msg.titl: It is not possible to re-initiate tax depreciation, because tax depreciation has not been interrupted.

msg.name: udalostOpetZahUcetBezPreruseni
msg.titl: It is not possible to re-initiate accounting depreciation, because accounting depreciation has not been interrupted

msg.name: udalostPrerDanOdpJizPreruseno
msg.titl: It is not possible to interrupt tax depreciation, because tax depreciation has already been interrupted.

msg.name: udalostPrerUcetOdpJizPreruseno
msg.titl: It is not possible to interrupt accounting depreciation, because accounting depreciation has already been interrupted.

msg.name: udalostZarazeniMusiBytPredZacOdpisu
msg.titl: Capitalization must precede initiation of depreciation.

msg.name: splatKalSumDphNevyplneno
msg.titl: VAT must be filled in for given VAT rate.

msg.titl: Any user changes after the first day of the current accounting period will be cancelled during the recalculation.\nDo you wish to continue?

msg.name: konrolaDanOdpisuUkoncitProcesDotaz

msg.name: majKontrolaRuznaDelkaOdpisu
msg.titl: Depreciation period does not match (correct %p / current %p).

msg.name: majKontrolaNeniNovyOdpis
msg.titl: Depreciation exists for an asset but should not.

msg.name: majKontrolaNeniStaryOdpis
msg.titl: Depreciation does not exist for an asset but should.

msg.name: majKontrolaRuznaCastkaPoslOdpisu
msg.titl: Last depreciation amount does not match (correct %p / current %p).

msg.name: majKontrolaRuznyZustPoslOdpisu
msg.titl: Last depreciation balance does not match (correct %p / current %p).

msg.name: majKontrolaRuznySoucetOdpisu
msg.titl: Last depreciation total does not match (correct %p / current %p).

msg.name: majKontrolaUvod
msg.titl: A difference was identified during a check of tax depreciation between the saved depreciation and the new calculations.\nWe recommend checking them and possibly correcting them using a user change in depreciation (see below for instructions on calculating the correct amount of depreciation).\nDifferences were identified in the case of the following assets:

msg.name: majKontrolaKonec
msg.titl:
Recommended procedure for calculating the amounts that need to be set in the field Tax depreciation: 

 DTax depreciation = 
 + <součet správných odpisů včetně měsíce, kdy odpisy měníme>
 - <součet chybných odpisů bez měsíce, kdy odpisy měníme>

 (the goal is to get to the correct amount for the sum of tax depreciation, so the next calculation will be based on the correct residual price) 
 Enter the correct balance into the Balance field.

msg.name: majKontrolaOk
msg.titl: ###V daňových odpisech majetku, který je aktivní v účetním období %p nebyly nalezeny žádné nesrovnalosti.
